name: The Martian VR Experience
description: The Martian VR Experience is an interactive, immersive adventure from the perspective of astronaut Mark Watney. Participants perform tasks for Watney’s survival, fly onto the surface of Mars, steer at zero gravity through space, drive a rover, and experience key scenes from the hit film in an interactive virtual reality environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 /Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel™ i7 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better

reviews.review_text: Wow! Too short? Yes indeed. Too easy? Yes. For a short period of time leave you feeling like you are the guy stranded on Mars and then being rescued, with amazing visual content that gets your heart pumping? YES. Enjoy the moment folks! Do it more than once and just allow yourself in and feel what Mark felt. Awesome.

I have just purchased and played the martian experience..Great graphics and interactive experience, how vr should be. BUT..the $20.00 price tag is ludicrous, from start to end was +- 15 minutes, I really hope there are updates coming as I feel I have been knocked over the head and robbed. It is a nouveau cuisine vr experience, looks good, costs plenty but there is very little of it . IF I was a retailer doing a demo I would use this to demo VR, but as a 'game' for someone who already has a HMD I would not even recommend it at 1/2 the price.
This game is absolute garbage. I was naive thinking that the previous reviewers were too harsh, but I was very very wrong.
